response.overview: Independence Day 3: New Beginning marks Will Smith’s return to the iconic alien invasion saga. Set after Earth's uneasy peace, rebuilt with alien technology, a new, greater threat looms. The teaser reveals a transformed Earth with advanced cities and preparations for future invasions. A shocking twist unveils Captain Steven Hiller (Will Smith), long thought dead, making a mysterious comeback. His survival raises questions and tensions within Earth's space defense forces. Hiller’s return rekindles hope as he faces an even more advanced enemy. Promising nostalgia, stunning visuals, and intense action, this teaser sets the stage for an explosive new chapter.
response.title: Independence Day 3
